message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only offer $120 for it.  What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $135.
Alice, I understand you're trying to meet me halfway, but $135 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $125. Let's see if we can make this work.
I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $130 is still a bit higher than my target. I'm willing to go up to $128.  This is my final offer. What do you say?
I understand that you've made a final offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $128. I'm willing to meet you at $129, but that's as low as I can go.
